ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] The News
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thunder Cat  wrote:Has anyone heard the news lately about EverQuest? They said that millions of people play this game daily,
ygData.messageBody:
:( your parents are insane!

 Thunder Cat <Thunder_Cat_4283@...> wrote:

Has anyone heard the news lately about EverQuest? They said that millions of
people play this game daily, and there have been many suicides brought on by
it. They also said people become obsessed and make the game their
life...they don't get jobs or do anything else, just play all the time. My
parents are now concerned and told me as soon as they see any signs that I
am going to kill myself, they are taking the game away. I can't believe
that...the game is fun, yeah, but to end your life over it? Come on.
